original_title: 仮面ライダー平成ジェネレーションズ　Dr.パックマン対エグゼイド&ゴースト　with レジェンドライダー
overview: As a computer virus based on Pac-Man invades Japan, a group of doctors attack Genm Corp and begin a wave of terror using stolen Proto Gashats. Ghost and Ex-Aid find themselves at the center of the fight in an effort to protect those most important to them. But they aren’t alone, as Heisei Riders from the past join them to stop Dr. Pac-Man!
tagline: This battle game must be cleared! The Super Hero Year finally reaches its climax!!
title: Kamen Rider Heisei Generations: Dr. Pac-Man vs. Ex-Aid & Ghost with Legend Riders
